DOC.brief_summary: Multicenter prospective study compare diagnosis value high-resolution EEG depth-EEG localize epileptogenic zone drug resistant partial epilepsy .
DOC.brief_title: Localizing Epileptogenic Zone With High Resolution Electroencephalography
DOC.criteria: medically intractable patial epilepsy confirm videoEEG recording epileptic seizure .
